response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am delighted to present our premium product, which holds immense value and potential for growth. This unique offering is worth more than $1,000,000 to us, encapsulating cutting-edge technology, unparalleled quality, and strategic advantages. Given its exceptional nature, we are extending an exclusive opportunity to acquire this product at an offer price of $1,500,000. We believe this is a fair and generous offer, considering the immense value it brings to any business or individual looking to elevate their position in the market. Please let us know if you would like to discuss this further or if you have any questions about the product's capabilities and benefits. We look forward to potentially working with you.", "product_price": 1500000}
